features.title: This page handle JSON without use client by fetching the data on the server. rendering the page as complete HTML, and sending it to the browser.
features.heading: This approach avoids extra JavaScript on the client, improves performance, enhances SEO, and simplifies the process by letting the server do all the heavy lifting before the page is delivered.
